short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick NDC and Product name search on EzriRx platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows EzriRx users to search on EzriRx marketplace from anywhere with a simple click.

1. Select the product NDC or name.
2. Click on the selection.
3. Click "EzriRx Search" in the opened pop-up.
4. Check our EzriRx prices for the searched product (you must be logged on https://app.ezrirx.com/).
